A list of the experiments you have already made would be very usefull. This could help when planning a new mission.

Maybe you landed on the MÃƒÂ¼n and made some experiments on craters and when you decide to do some more you don't know what craters you have already been to.

Beat you by 9 minutes. Of course might of taken my more than that to write. See my Science Spread Sheet Thread.

But Yes it is NEEDED.
You weren't the first either, Sathurn, there have been several threads discussing this, e.g. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53339-Complete-list-of-experiments
